attributes.action: Create a Department of Government Efficiency in the UK. DOGE!
attributes.additional_details: This is self-explanatory: the UK Government wastes millions of our tax money, and we want this to stop.
attributes.background: DOGE's purpose is to reduce wasteful and fraudulent Government spending, and eliminate excessive regulations. We would like the UK Government to form a department similar to the Department of Government Efficiency that Elon is heading up in the USA.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701630
